page.title: 11Changes in Colney Heath
page.content: Colney Heath has changed a lot over the last 30 years. We asked people who have lived in the village all their lives what it was like when they were younger.{New housing estates}have been built. All of these roads are new:{ {Cutmore Drive, Meadway, Hall Gardens, {Franklin Close and Admirals Close.} There used to be a factory where Cutmore Drive is. There used to be a { {butchers shop, 2 black smiths, a {grocers and a general store.}Now there is a {newsagents, hairdressers, {supermarket and post office.}There was an {old school}in Colney Heath built in {1814.}It had high windows. A new primary school was built in{1966}and the old school has now been knocked down. The A1 is being widened near Colney Heath and some of the access roads are going to be closed off.
